channel.title: How do i make monsters agrgresive and how do i save an integer?
channel.description:
how do i make monsters on sight?
and how would i save an integer into their player file
id use moreinfo right? but then how would i do it
thanks!

item.title: How do i make monsters agrgresive and how do i save an integer?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

To Load The Integer:

Go to:

public int loadmoreinfo() {

Scroll Down till you see:

character-lastlogin

Or:

character-pkpoints

After The Last Closing Bracket, add your integer, following the format that is shown:

else if (token.equals("character-INTNAME")) { INTNAME = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

To Make It Save, Go To:

public boolean savemoreinfo() {

Scroll Down To:

characterfile.write("character-ancients

Or:

characterfile.write("character-pkpoints

And Again Follow The Format With Your Int’s Name, like so:

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-INTNAME = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(INTNAME), 0, Integer.toString(INTNAME).length());

Read full topic
